location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter forwards copies of a translation of a letter, dated 11 March 1811, from Mahomed Ismail Cusvinee to Jonathan Duncan, Governor of Bombay, regarding his monthly pension and directs that Bruce advise him that his application has been referred to the Governor General.
